page.title: 18Mayoral day, Chelmsford (2)
page.content: When the awards had been given the {mayoress}received her{second bouquet of the day and soon after{18:00}we re- turned to the{mayor's house for tea. Here the chains of office were removed and while the mayor chatted to us the mayoress served a delicious tea. After tea it was time to prepare for the {evening engagement.}This took rather longer than expected as our 3 girls decided to have baths before changing into fresh dresses. The Daimler conveyed us all to{Trin- {ity Methodist Church}where the{British {Red Cross Society}was holding a{music- {al evening}in aid of{Bangladesh Cycl- {one Appeal.}Here we were joined by our teacher and enjoyed music well played on{Piano,Oboe,Guitar and Recorder. At the interval we said farewell and were driven home,realising how{busy}& {varied (and tiring)the mayor's day is.
